data.title: Buy an Unattended Cremation Plan - Choice Plan
data.text:
Unattended Cremation

Our Unattended Cremation Plan (also sometimes referred to as a Direct Cremation Plan) may be suitable for those who are looking for a simple, dignified and low-cost cremation without the formalities of a funeral, with no service and no family, friends or mourners present at the crematorium.

£1,795

Equivalent price if this funeral product was purchased today: £1,785 excl. doctors fees.

This price is a national average, based on 277 branches within the Funeral Partners Network and is correct as of 19th July 2024

Online payment will be taken in full by debit/credit card, cheque or bank transfer.

If you would prefer to pay by monthly instalments you can call the choice office on 01803 298 243 during office hours for a quote and to buy a Plan.

What's Included

Funeral Directors Services

Wood Effect Veneered Coffin

Crematorium Fee

Doctor’s fees (if required)

What's Not Included

Embalming

The ability to specify the crematorium, date or time of when the cremation will take place

The ability to have a ceremony at the crematorium with any family, friends or mourners present

Choice Funeral Plans are provided by Alternative Planning Company Limited (APCL), which incurs costs in order to provide this funeral plan to you. APCL typically retains around £475 of the price you pay for your funeral plan to cover our costs. Our costs are included in the price you pay for the funeral plan.

Overview of your Funeral Plan

Here's what to expect from your plan, and a summary of the choices you've selected

Unattended Cremation

Your Choice Funeral Plan

Statement of Demands and Needs

You asked for an Unattended Cremation Plan that satisfies your primary requirement to ensure that some of your funeral costs are met by the plan on your death, and you understand these are not already covered by another plan. The specific costs covered are set out in your Unattended Cremation Plan. You consider that the Unattended Cremation Plan meets your demands and needs.
